amendment.description: To strike the amendments made by section 202, regarding the National Homeland Security Council.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3763 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3763 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Coleman. (consideration: CR S9913-9914; text: CR S9913) To strike the amendments made by section 202, regarding the National Homeland Security Council.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3763 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3763 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Coleman.
